channel.title: CVE Feed for CA Technologies -- Unified Infrastructure Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CA Technologies -- Unified Infrastructure Management

item.title: CVE-2018-13821|2024-08-05T09:14:47.242Z -- ca%20technologies -- unified%20infrastructure%20management
item.description: A lack of authentication, in CA Unified Infrastructure Management 8.5.1, 8.5, and 8.4.7, allows remote attackers to conduct a variety of attacks, including file reading/writing.

item.title: CVE-2018-13819|2024-08-05T09:14:47.195Z -- ca%20technologies -- unified%20infrastructure%20management
item.description: A hardcoded secret key, in CA Unified Infrastructure Management 8.5.1, 8.5, and 8.4.7, allows attackers to access sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2018-13820|2024-08-05T09:14:47.257Z -- ca%20technologies -- unified%20infrastructure%20management
item.description: A hardcoded passphrase, in CA Unified Infrastructure Management 8.5.1, 8.5, and 8.4.7, allows attackers to access sensitive information.
